<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="2"/><value name="IF0"><block type="text_binary_ops"><value name="A"><block type="get_command_parameters"><field name="paramid">0</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">rumbling</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="1"/><comment h="80" pinned="true" w="160">Cancel Rumbling
